DOC.brief_summary: This Post-Marketing Surveillance study evaluate Efficacy , Tolerability Safety Olmesartan medoxomil 20 mg combination 12.5 MG hydrochlorothiazide subject mild moderate essential hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Post-Marketing Surveillance Of Olmesartan Medoxomil In Combination With Hydrochlorothiazide
DOC.criteria: Male Female patient 18 65 y/old Patient previously take lowdose medoxomil ARB alone uncontrolled BP Patient uncontrolled mild moderate hypertension ( SBP > = 140 < =179 mmHg OR DBP > =90 < =109 mmHg ) Pregnant Lactating woman History secondary hypertension
